verses.name: Luke 6:4
verses.text: How he went into the house of God, and did take and eat the shewbread, and gave also to them that were with him; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone?

verses.name: Luke 6:5
verses.text: And he said unto them, That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.

verses.name: Luke 6:6
verses.text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath, that he entered into the synagogue and taught: and there was a man whose right hand was withered.
